name: bnj31
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), wrex(s0, c0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), wrex(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w2, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(w2, w1)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
